parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.72

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Custom Panels

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns information about what is currently displayed on given player's info panel.<br>
Returns ["EmptyDisplay","EmptyDisplayComponent"] when no panel is open.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[infoPanel]] infoPanelId

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> infoPanelId: [[String]] - info panel classname, or "left" or "right"

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [componentClass, componentType]

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[infoPanel]] "left";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Custom Info]], [[infoPanels]], [[setInfoPanel]], [[infoPanelComponents]], [[enableInfoPanelComponent]], [[infoPanelComponentEnabled]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
